message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer and would like to make a counteroffer. Given my budget, I am willing to pay up to $10000 for the product.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. Would you be willing to go a bit higher?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget and the value I see in the product, I am willing to pay $12000 for it.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $12000 yet. I'm willing to compromise, so how about we meet in the middle at $13250? I think that's a fair price for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering the value of the product and my budget, I am willing to pay $12500 for it.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm starting to think you really want this product. I'm willing to make one more concession, so how about we meet at $14000? I think that's the best I can do, but I'm willing to listen to your thoughts.
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. After further reflection, I believe $13500 is the maximum I can offer for the product.
I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to make one final concession. I'll meet you at $14250, but that's as low as I can go. If you're still interested, let's shake on it!
Alice, thank you for your patience and willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $14000 for the product.
